Package auction_functionality

Class Auction

java.lang.Object
auction_functionality.Auction
public class Auction extends Object
The Auction class represents one auction session. Contains all necessary data. List of AuctionPane that part of observer and are used to show information about auction. List of CountDownLabel is for showing dynamic countdown of auction. List of Button and ChoiceBox for more dynamic hiding and showing of gui through auction. Also contains most important TimeCountdonw which is thread created for counting time and executing of transaction. Thats was for gui but next data is for functionality. AuctionSetup is is representing design pattern strategy. {Nft2D} represents NFT which is going to be in auction. current price representing highest bid, winned Account holding reference to Account with highest bid and active representing if auction is ative or not.
